whatIsService.title: What Is Leg Hair Removal?
whatIsService.content:
Unwanted leg hair can be bothersome - shaving, waxing or depilatories are temporary and can cause irritation, ingrown hairs, or uneven results. **Leg Hair Removal** is a cosmetic procedure that effectively reduces and removes unwanted hair on the legs, giving you smooth, silky skin.

At The Skin Firm, NIBM, Pune, we specialise in **laser leg hair removal**, a safe, dermatologist-led treatment that targets follicles to deliver **permanent leg hair removal results**, tailored for your skin type, hair texture, and lifestyle.

faqs.title: FAQs on Laser Leg Hair Removal Treatment

questions.question: Q. Is laser leg hair removal permanent?
questions.answer: **Laser hair removal** offers long-term reduction by targeting hair follicles. While some fine regrowth may occur over time, most patients experience 80–90% permanent reduction.

questions.question: Q. Is the Laser Leg Hair Removal treatment safe for all skin types?
questions.answer: Yes. At The Skin Firm, we use advanced FDA-approved lasers that are safe and effective across different skin tones and hair types, with settings customised by our dermatologist.

questions.question: Q. Does laser leg hair removal hurt?
questions.answer: The procedure is generally well-tolerated. Most patients describe it as a mild snapping sensation. Cooling gels and devices are used to keep you comfortable.

questions.question: Q. How many sessions of leg hair removal will I need?
questions.answer: Typically, 6–8 sessions spaced 4–6 weeks apart are required for best results, though this may vary depending on your hair density, skin type, and hormonal factors.

questions.question: Q. Can I shave between sessions?
questions.answer: Yes, shaving is safe and even recommended between laser sessions. Avoid waxing, threading, or plucking, as these remove the hair follicle the laser needs to target.

questions.question: Q. Are there any side effects of Leg Hair Removal Treatment?
questions.answer: Mild redness or sensitivity may occur temporarily but usually subsides within a few hours. Our dermatologist ensures the procedure is performed safely to minimise risks like burns or pigmentation.

questions.question: Q. Who is a good candidate for laser leg hair removal?
questions.answer: Anyone with unwanted leg hair looking for a long-term, low-maintenance solution. It is especially beneficial for those prone to ingrown hairs, razor burns, or irritation from shaving/waxing.

questions.question: Q. How soon will I see results after my leg hair removal treatment?
questions.answer: You’ll notice reduced hair growth after the very first session, with smoother, thinner regrowth after subsequent treatments. Final results are visible after completing the full course.
